name: Mask
description:
Mask is an object commonly worn on the face for protection, disguise, performance or entertainment. Mask have a long history in human life with various functions that continue to shift according to the conditions of the times, users and their needs.

But in humans, there are various kinds of masks that can be used alternately. The mask appears naturally under certain conditions with a specific purpose. The mask has no real form, but the mask is very felt. According to its function, masks can protect but can also be dangerous, masks can be disguised but inadvertently they display reality.

Regards,

Montha
